title: Science Learning Adaptation and Self-Efficacy Enhancement Program for Pre-Service Teachers

context.additional_context: A program supporting pre-service teachers in developing science pedagogy skills and adapting to organizational life.

learning_goals: Learners enhance science lesson design self-efficacy by 20% or more through collaborative activities with peer teachers.
Learners acquire digital resource utilization strategies within LMS to improve academic confidence.
Learners develop and implement science education theory application plans through intentional reading activities.
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
